title: Forgot gmail pw and can't change it to another gmail
body: I forgot my gmail and didn't save it into my phone my gmail pw cause i think i remember it and now i wanna change my pw in league but i can't so i try to find my gmail pw and i still can't find it . So what should i do now ... ( sorry if my english suck , cause i just moved to USA for 3 years )

replies.body:
Galacius with the assist ^_^!

Their suggestion would be a good way to recover your gmail password. If you need to make any changes to your account or still can't get signed in, go ahead and hit up our account team using their [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).

Hello Nghi,

Go ahead and try following these steps here --> https://support.google.com/mail/answer/41078?hl=en 

That should help you reset your gmail password and should help you get into your account!
